explanation:
code_hardening: Added lazy initialization with a null check on fontStylePanel and ensured dependent components (fontStyleTextField and fontStyleList) are obtained via their getters so they are non-null and created only once.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the missing getFontStylePanel() method using existing fields and constants (TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT), matching the signature expected by init() and callers.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced constructor-driven assembly with a dedicated, lazily initialized getFontStylePanel that builds a BorderLayout panel with an empty border, fixed preferred size (140 x TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT), a top label, and a child panel containing the text field and a scrollable list. Configured the JScrollPane to always show the vertical scrollbar and be non-focusable.
refactoring: Removed magic numbers by relying on the existing TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT constant and clarified structure by introducing a clearly named innerPanel for composition.
misc: Improved accessibility by adding a left-aligned "Font Style" label with mnemonic 'Y' and binding it to the font style text field; minor comments added to clarify lazy initialization behavior. New custom API calls used: none.
